comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label indicating storage and quota information. It appears as a table header column title in a UI component, informing users about the available storage capacity. The text will vary depending on whether default rooms quota has been set or not.

usage.context:
showStorageInfo &&
 columns.splice(columns.length, 0, {
 key: "Storage",
 title:
 isDefaultRoomsQuotaSet && !isArchiveFolder
 ? t("Common:StorageAndQuota")
 : t("Common:Storage"),
 enable: roomQuotaColumnIsEnable,
 sortBy: SortByFieldName.UsedSpace,
 resizable: true,
 onChange: this.onColumnChange,

showStorageInfo &&
 columns.splice(columns.length, 0, {
 key: "Storage",
 title:
 isDefaultRoomsQuotaSet && !isArchiveFolder
 ? t("Common:StorageAndQuota")
 : t("Common:Storage"),
 enable: roomQuotaColumnIsEnable,
 sortBy: SortByFieldName.UsedSpace,
 resizable: true,
 onChange: this.onColumnChange,

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Yaddaş" is a valid translation for "Storage," it's more commonly associated with memory. For data storage in a technical context, "Saxtələşdirilib" (saxlama) or "Saxtələşdirilib" (paylanma) might be more accurate.
The slash "/" might be better represented with a hyphen "-" or a word like "və" (and) to conform to typical Azerbaijani conventions for lists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yaddaş - Kvota or Yaddaş və Kvota

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Ποσόστωση” while generally meaning 'quota', doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Quota' in the context of storage. A more precise translation would convey the idea of allocated space and limits.

While "Archivio" can mean storage, it doesn't fully capture the concept of 'Storage' in the context of cloud services or data storage. It leans more towards an archive of documents. "Spazio di archiviazione" or "Memoria" would be more accurate depending on the specific context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Spazio di archiviazione" or "Memoria" for a more accurate translation of 'Storage'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ストレージ／容量制限' is a reasonable attempt, but '容量制限' (capacity restriction) doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Quota'. Quota implies a defined allowance, not just a general limitation. A more accurate translation would incorporate that sense.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ストレージ／ कोटा (using the English word 'Quota' transliterated) or ストレージ／割り当て容量 (storage allocation)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ເກັບມ້ຽນ" (kept/stored) and "ຈຳນວນອະນຸຍາດ" (permitted quantity) are not inherently incorrect, they might not fully capture the nuance of "Storage / Quota". 'Quota' implies a limit or allowance, which these words don't directly convey.  A more accurate translation might incorporate the idea of a limit or allocated space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "ເນື້ອທີ່ເກັບມ້ຽນ / ຈຳນວນອະນຸຍາດ" (Storage space / Permitted quantity) or "ພື້ນທີ່ເກັບມ້ຽນ / ຈຳນວນອະນຸຍາດ" (Storage area / Permitted quantity) to better reflect the meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Pamięć" translates to memory, it doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Storage" in this context, which refers to storage space or capacity. "Przestrzeń dyskowa" or "Pojemność" would be more accurate alternatives.

The Sinhala translation "ආචයනය / සලාකය" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Storage / Quota". "ආචයනය" (aachchanaya) typically refers to collection or gathering, and doesn't relate to data storage. "සලාකය" (salaakaya) means 'salary' or 'wage', which is also unrelated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be "சேமிப்பு / ஒதுக்கீடு" (Semippu / Ottukaadu) which translates to Storage / Allocation, or "சேமிப்பகம் / ஒதுக்கீடு" (Semippapakam / Ottukaadu) which translates to Storage / Allocation. Consider context for best option.
